options.name: Comic Relief
options.description: Gain +1 Performance. When you roll a 1 on a Defense or Attack Check, the next Ally to make a Defense or Attack Check within 8 Units of you gains a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Reaction : Duck!
options.description: In response to a Creature making a Melee or Projectile Attack at you, you roll an Initiative Check against the Attack instead in an attempt to redirect the Attack to a Creature that is Adjacent to you. If successful, the Adjacent Creature must make the Defense Check intead of you.

options.name: Scripted Fate
options.description: When you use a Luck Dice, you can instead roll a 1d4. On a 2 or higher, replace the original roll with an 11. Otherwise, the roll becomes a 1.

options.name: Reaction : Words of Wisdom
options.description: When an Allied Humanoid within 4 Units of you rolls a Skill Check, you offer up words of wisdom in the form of a motto or advice. You then make the same Check with a 1d4 Bonus that replaces the Check made by the Ally.

options.name: Free Action : Catch Phrase
options.description: You Speak your catchphrase before making an Attack. If the Creature dies or falls Unconscious as a result of this Attack, you and everyone within 8 Units who can Hear you gains a Heroic Action.

options.name: Last Words
options.description: In response to being in Lifeline even if you are Unconscious, you gather the strength to offer your final words to anyone within 4 Units, forcing a Death Check. When making your Death Check, you add your Performance Modifier to a maximum of 6 to the Roll.
